name: lolpickem
description: A Pick'em style game for League of Legends fans.
author: Sydney Heller

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd lol-pickem-api && npm run start:watch" "cd lol-pickem-app && npm run start"
scripts.dev:debug: concurrently "cd lol-pickem-api && npm run debug" "cd lol-pickem-app && npm run start"
scripts.push-api-heroku: git subtree push --prefix lol-pickem-api heroku master
scripts.deploy-api: cd lol-pickem-api && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run push-api-heroku
scripts.deploy-app: cd lol-pickem-app && ng build --prod && cd ../ && netlify deploy --prod --dir=./lol-pickem-app/dist/lol-pickem-app
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-app && npm run deploy-api
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd lol-pickem-api && npm i" "cd lol-pickem-app && npm i"
